original: @196a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @196a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: rakta badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na /
analyzed: rakta badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na /
translated: Rakta-vajrayoginī-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Red Vajrayoginī Sādhana

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajrayoginī.

original: dang po ae'i dkyil du pam las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma'i lte bar //
analyzed: dang po ae'i dkyil du pam las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma'i lte bar //
translated: First, in the center of a ai, from paṃ arises a multicolored lotus.

original: ram dmar po yongs su gyur ba las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ram dmar po yongs su gyur ba las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In its center, from a red raṃ arises a sun maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du h'um yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan @196b 'das ma bsams la /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan @196b 'das ma bsams la /
translated: Upon that, from a hūṃ arises Bhagavatī.

original: mchod pa byas te /
analyzed: mchod pa byas te /
translated: Make offerings:

original: aom badzra yo gi n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra yo gi n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ vajra-puṣpe āḥ hūṃ

original: de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la aom d'a ki n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /🔽lho'i 'dab ma la aom l'a me h'um badzra push'am pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la aom d'a ki n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a / lho'i 'dab ma la aom l'a me h'um badzra push'am pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Similarly, on the petal in the east, oṃ ḍākinī hūṃ vajra-puṣpe āḥ hūṃ🔽on the petal in the south, oṃ lāmā hūṃ vajra-puṣpe āḥ hūṃ

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la aom khanda ro h'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: nub kyi 'dab ma la aom khanda ro h'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: on the petal in the west, oṃ khaṇḍarohā hūṃ vajra-puṣpe āḥ hūṃ

original: byang gi 'dab ma la aom r'u pi n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: byang gi 'dab ma la aom r'u pi n'i h'um badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: On the northern petal is oṃ rūpiṇi hūṃ.🔽

original: zhes bya bas mchod la /
analyzed: zhes bya bas mchod la /
translated: On the northern petal, “oṃ rūpiṇi hūṃ vajra puṣpam pratikṣeva svāhā” is the offering.🔽Then, the meditation:

original: de nas bsgom pa ni gcer bu sku mdog dmar ba 'od zer 'bar ba /
analyzed: de nas bsgom pa ni gcer bu sku mdog dmar ba 'od zer 'bar ba /
translated: Red, naked, blazing with light

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: , one face, two arms

original: zhal la bdud rtse 'chang ba /
analyzed: zhal la bdud rtse 'chang ba /
translated: , holding nectar in the mouth

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: , three eyes

original: spyan zlum zhing dmar la 'gyur pa /🔽dpral ba'i mdzod spul khro gnyer yod pa /
analyzed: spyan zlum zhing dmar la 'gyur pa / dpral ba'i mdzod spul khro gnyer yod pa /
translated: , round, red eyes that roll🔽, a frown on the forehead🔽, bared fangs

original: mche ba gtsigs pa /🔽lngags  'dril ba /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pa / lngags  'dril ba /
translated: , holding a rosary

original: dbu skra grol ba /
analyzed: dbu skra grol ba /
translated: , loose hair

original: ro'i gdan la zhabs g-yon bskum pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: ro'i gdan la zhabs g-yon bskum pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa /
translated: , standing in the manner of pressing down on a corpse seat with the left leg

original: gzhon nu ma'i cha byad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i cha byad dang ldan pa /
translated: , having the form of a young girl

original: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang dril bu g-yer kha'i phreng bas zhabs gdub byas shing sgra grags pa /
analyzed: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang dril bu g-yer kha'i phreng bas zhabs gdub byas shing sgra grags pa /
translated: , anklets of latticework, half-latticework, and strings of little bells that make a sound

original: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa phyag g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga thogs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa phyag g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga thogs pa /
translated: , adorned with the six mudras, holding a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga in the left hand

original: g-yas pas rdo rje gri gug 'chang ba /
analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rje gri gug 'chang ba /
translated: , holding a vajra flaying knife in the right hand

original: drag mo'i gzugs can /
analyzed: drag mo'i gzugs can /
translated: , having a wrathful form🔽.

original: dur khrod la sogs par rnal 'byor ba snying rje dang ldan phas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dur khrod la sogs par rnal 'byor ba snying rje dang ldan phas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The yogī who is endowed with compassion should practice in a charnel ground, and so forth.

original: bsgom pas skyo na sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //🔽aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye /
analyzed: bsgom pas skyo na sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o // aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye /
translated: When one is tired of meditating, one should do the mantra recitation.🔽Oṃ sarva buddha dakiniye vajra varṇaniye

original: badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: vajra vairocanīye hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the root mantra.

original: aom sarba siddhim pra t'i tstsha hr'i h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba siddhim pra t'i tstsha hr'i h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ sarva siddhiṃ prāta citta hriḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽This is the essence mantra.

original: snying po'o // aom badzra yo g'i n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: snying po'o // aom badzra yo g'i n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra yoginīye hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the close essence mantra.

original: aom badzra d'a ki n'i ye hem h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ki n'i ye hem h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra dakiniye hem hūṃ.

original: ai dam ba lim grihna grihna ha ha kha kha dza dza aa aa h'um ma ma siddhi pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ai dam ba lim grihna grihna ha ha kha kha dza dza aa aa h'um ma ma siddhi pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Idaṃ baliṃ gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa ha ha kha kha ja ja a a hūṃ māṃ siddhiṃ prāta citta svāhā.

original: gtor ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags so //
translated: This is the bali mantra.

original: tshes brgyad dang bcu'am bcu bzhi la dur khrod la sogs par nges par mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshes brgyad dang bcu'am bcu bzhi la dur khrod la sogs par nges par mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should definitely make offerings on the eighth, tenth, or fourteenth in a charnel ground, and so forth.

original: gdams ngag chen po'i yul du gyur pa /
analyzed: gdams ngag chen po'i yul du gyur pa /
translated: This is the domain of the great instruction.

original: dpal ri khrod dbang phyug gis bstan pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal ri khrod dbang phyug gis bstan pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The teaching of Śrīparvateśvara is complete.
